revised_title: Future Shipyard Technologies and Trends in the 1980s
tldr: This article discusses the future of shipbuilding and shipyard technologies in the 1980s, considering the impact of world trends, economic and social influences on trade and investment patterns. It explores the growing influence of emerging nations, the development of specialized ship types, and the role of ships in integrated transport systems. The article also examines the siting and design of future shipyards, taking into account advances in technology and changes in trade patterns and transport systems.
